FuncDef: This command configures traffic flow to be forwarded via match in the redirect policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 or IPv6 address to match the destination address in the IP header of the traffic received from the subscriber.
Specifies the length of the prefix specified by the ip-address. Values-1 to 128 for IPv6.
Specifies the protocol to match the IP protocol in the IP header of the traffic received from the subscriber. Values-tcp, udp.
Specifies the port to match the destination port in the HTTP request. Values-1 to 65535.
